user.title: Set up Multizone Heater
user.description:
Configure the main climate entity and zone control settings. The main climate (boiler) temperature sensor in the corridor will be used for temperature display.

{tip}

data.main_climate: Main Climate Entity (optional, but needed for temperature display)
data.main_temp_sensor: Main Temperature Sensor Override (optional, overrides main climate sensor)
data.all_satisfied_mode: Main Target When All Zones Satisfied (0%=lowest target, 50%=average target, 100%=highest target)

add_zone.title: Add Heating Zone
add_zone.description:
Add a heating zone. Each zone requires a climate entity. If using valves, BOTH physical valve and virtual switch are required.

{zone_count}

data.virtual_switch: Virtual Switch (required if using physical valve)

fallback_zones.title: Select Fallback Zones
fallback_zones.description: Select at least one zone to keep open when all zones are satisfied or during cooling mode. This ensures pump safety and system stability.

error.no_zones: At least one zone must be configured.

error.need_fallback: At least one fallback zone must be selected for pump safety.
error.invalid_temp_range: Main minimum temperature must be less than main maximum temperature.
